subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers must adapt to slow the Lightning’s electrifying line of Tyler Johnson, Ondrej Palat and Nikita Kucherov. Game 4 of the Eastern Conference finals is Friday night.
snippet: The Rangers must adapt to slow the Lightning’s electrifying line of Tyler Johnson, Ondrej Palat and Nikita Kucherov. Game 4 of the Eastern Conference finals is Friday night.
